alert.note: Alert for Butte; Northern Foot Hills; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 6:08PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Butte, western Meade and northeastern Lawrence Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 608 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles south of Belle Fourche, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Saint Onge around 620 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for northwestern and west central South Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Northern Foot Hills; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
